name: The Seven Kirusa Riders
description: It's a third person puzzle game about a detective. No one knows their name, face or even their gender! The only available information is that their hair is gray. That's why people call them "The Gray Detective". They solved every cast they've ever encountered. However, the gray detective is missing for 7 years! The police sent them multiple messages throughout the years but no response was received. What happened?!
